original_text:
The sword shall rage against their cities,
    consume the bars of their gates,
    and devour them because of their own counsels.
korean_text: 칼이 그들의 성읍들을 치며 빗장을 깨뜨려 없이하리니 이는 그들의 계책으로 말미암음이니라

sentences.original_text: The sword shall rage against their cities
sentences.korean_translation: 칼이 그들의 성읍들을 향해 분노할 것이며

sentences.original_text: consume the bars of their gates
